definition: to be in favor of/to support/to back/support/backing/to stand by/CL:個|个[ge4]
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

pinyin: duo1 zhong3 yu3 yan2 zhi1 chi2

sentences.english: Resume breakpoint to support the proposal to use the software to download.
sentences.chinese: 建議使用支持斷點續傳的軟件下載。

sentences.english: Cheng says her mother was an advocate of this style of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 沈婆婆說她母親是這種服裝的支持者。

sentences.english: Yang Lei's mother supported her daughter's decision.
sentences.chinese: 楊雷的媽媽支持她女兒的選擇。

sentences.english: This system encourages not only internal promotions but lateral moves as well.
sentences.chinese: 該系統不僅鼓勵內部升職也支持平職調換。

sentences.english: S. senator. In Congress, Johnson was a strong advocate of America's westward expansion.
sentences.chinese: 在國會里，強森大力支持美國向西部擴張的計畫。

sentences.english: The encoding rules are very flexible and support the representation of data graphs and polymorphism.
sentences.chinese: 編碼規則非常靈活並支持圖形數據和多態的表示。

sentences.english: Registratie ongedaan maken van de User Account Control Support Library is mislukt.
sentences.chinese: 取消用戶賬戶支持運行庫失敗。

sentences.english: Is import of tangents supported by this importer.
sentences.chinese: 通過導入器是否支持切線導入。

sentences.english: You can modify the code presented here to support only key-press events.
sentences.chinese: 您可以修改本文所示的代碼以僅支持按鍵事件。

sentences.english: Supported user-defined unread notification of automatical protection.
sentences.chinese: 支持用戶自定義的新未讀消息彈出提示。

sentences.english: There remained much support for small-scale district control.
sentences.chinese: 小範圍的地區控制依然享有很多支持。

sentences.english: The SafeHouse is a place for people of different faiths to share and support each other.
sentences.chinese: 是一個讓來自不同信仰的人士分享及互相支持的天地。

sentences.english: C. back one year, put the year zero in the gap, and declare the disagreement solved.
sentences.chinese: 支持一年，投入年調零空白，並且宣稱解決的分歧。

sentences.english: Steven Gerrard today backed calls for the introduction of goal-line technology.
sentences.chinese: 傑拉德今天表示了他對引入球門線技術的支持。

sentences.english: His father did not hesitate to support and help him.
sentences.chinese: 李父毫不猶豫支持並扶持。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship between post-stroke depression and social sustain and coping style with an aim to guide the prospective psychological intervention.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦卒中後抑鬱與社會支持及應對方式的關係。

definition: variant of 給予|给予[ji3 yu3]
to be concerned about/to care about
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to repay a favor/to give back/feedback
